website_summaries.verdict: Best for screen tapping only, this 4-pack of pens is clearly made for a single purpose, and does it well, with a more sensitive fiber-covered tip.
pros: Cloth-covered rubber tip is less likely to mark or smudge screen
Very sensitive, getting a response from the device with just a light tap rather than having to push hard
Tips can be replaced easily and quickly
cons: Stylus tip gets visibly dirty quickly
Like most non-capacitive styli, do not work well for drawing or detailed graphics work

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today and am delighted! I've tried styluses before and never really cared for them (rubber tips that break down and leave little marks even when they're new). These felt different immediately! Sensitive, no marks, AND as an added bonus, extra tips!! I can't believe the deal here! 4 styluses + 4 extra tips + a nice case to stow your stylus in! All for the price of one sub-par rubber tipped stylus! Do not hesitate, buy this! You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable in your hand and gliding around device screens.
customer_reviews.text: These are the very best stylus’ I’ve ever used, and I have a drawer full on broken or unusable ones to prove it! This is the second box I’ve ordered because I was afraid they’d either sell out or be discontinued (usually my luck) or I’d never find them again. They glide across my iPhone making texting so much more accurate than my all-thumbs hands. The clip easily attaches to my “book type” phone case with the clip on the inside that doesn’t interfere with the ringer button and the stylus flush with the side of the case. The spare tips are a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbes' Mother

customer_reviews.title: Don't get turned off by the fat tip...great product!
customer_reviews.text: When these styluses (stylii??) came I thought shucks, the tip is SO fat. Ewwww...well, they are the greatest and now I love them. Previously I was using some really inexpensive rubber tipped styluses that broke down quickly. They had a pen function that never worked more than once or twice. The quality on these hybrid mesh styluses is WAAAAAY higher, and it's a really nice product
customer_reviews.author: Grady

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to get pens with red and teal colors from the picture that was given, NOT, I am upset because that is the reason I bought these pens. Also there were no extra tips ANYWHERE. I LOOKED EVERYWHERE AND THERE WERE NO TIPS just the ones that are already attached to the pens. I will be sending these back asap.
customer_reviews.author: grandbeauch

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty (almost too heavy)
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price, knitted tips are nice and smooth, much better than the regular rubber tips. However, they dirty easily. I contacted the company inquiring how to clean the tips/prevent tips from getting dirty. They responded that the only thing I could do was to keep my devices clean. I use these on my phone so even though I clean the screen one to two times a day, they it still gets dirty. Probably would last longer on other devices. But for the price, quantity, and replacement tips, they were a good but. Also, they are heavy, a bit awkward for my phone, a Galaxy Note.
customer_reviews.author: sbodie29

customer_reviews.title: Better than a fingertip
customer_reviews.text: Not as precise as I was hoping, but better than using my finger. I use my tablet for working on music notation and it uses handwriting of notes. My finger-drawn notes are often mis-recognized, so I was hoping this would work better. It does, but not as well as I was hoping. The stylus from my Note 3 works better, but is very small, hard to hold, and stays in my phone. I'll continue using these until I find something more precise.
customer_reviews.author: Dee NTop Contributor: Amazon Echo

customer_reviews.title: The best out there!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these stylus pens. This is my third time ordering them. I also ordered them at Christmas as stocking stuffers for the family with replacement nibs. These pens are particularly great because of the mesh ends. Never get those plastic ends, they fall apart so quickly. These pens really last and glide so easily across your tablet, cell phones or other electronic devices. I have carpal tunnel, so these help me tremendously with that. I love that they provide the extra nibs too.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M.

customer_reviews.title: Junk...do not get these!
customer_reviews.text: It glides effortlessly across the iPad screen, but often doesn’t provoke a response and nothing happens. Even tapping the screen often doesn’t work. You could be tapping or sliding just fine but then it stops and you have to rub the tip to make it work again, very frustrating especially when playing games. So I bought some rubber tipped styli instead and they work much better. Don’t buy these. Junk. I tossed them out to avoid future continued frustration of making mistakes during game play or just typing a text, or on Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Too Short-too thin
customer_reviews.text: This is not so much a product quality review as it is a ease-of-use one. I found this stylus to be much too short and thin for comfortable use. Opted to return and purchase a PHARRI brand stylus which is longer and a comfortable thickness (diameter) and is closer in dimension to the now unavailable Amazon Executive Stylus that I lost. Again, this is a subjective review and not in any way disparaging the overall quality of the ccivv stylus. Simply put, the ccivv stylus probably is more suited for folks with smaller hands, those that would purchase small or medium sized gloves for example example.
customer_reviews.author: R. Donnell

customer_reviews.title: These tips are very stiff and devices not as responsive as a result
customer_reviews.text: These are well made, comfortble to hold and nice looking. But their real purpose is to make excellent contact with a capacitive screen and allow the user to work more quickly with less strain. I tried them on both my LG V40 Thinq phone and on my iPad Pro 10.5. In both cases I had to be very delicate and be sure to touch the screens ever-so-gently. If I wasn't careful the stylus hit too hard and was not responded to. They make work for a screen that needs this degree of density but I'm not sure what screen that would be.
customer_reviews.author: Lou250

customer_reviews.title: Change the tip when it starts to not work properly
customer_reviews.text: Great product. One tip lasted me a year though I probably should have changed it a month or so sooner. Towards the end of the year I had to press harder to get it to work. When I finally changed the tip it was like I had a new tablet. So after 10 or 11 months you should probably think about changing the tip. Before I had this stylus I had to buy a new one every 3 or 4 weeks and they didn’t work as good.
customer_reviews.author: Non-techie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: If I could leave 0 stars that is what I would rate these. Pure junk. Don’t bother! Have ones 2 years old that work better! The tip isn’t firm enough to work without really hitting it very hard!
customer_reviews.author: PENNY GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive. Paid nearly - or over $10 for ONE stylus at Staples, and those have plain hollow rubber tips that don’t last. These last me months. Very happy with them, plus you get 4 extra tips in the box. I do lots of work on my various spreadsheets 5 days a week, so they get plenty of use.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat a great stylus!
customer_reviews.text: I think I've bought five sets of these now! I have them at work, in my purse, at my desk, in my car, at the kitchen planning station, and have gifted several to friends who have tried them and loved them. It's like finding a favorite pen, and wanting it in every color in all the places you frequent.
customer_reviews.author: GKT

customer_reviews.title: Great for big hands and cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I bought these partly for cold weather phone/tablet use and partly because my dad has large fingers and prefers using a stylus on his phone, especially when we play Pokemon Go. These are much better than rubber tipped styluses, especially in cold weather, they work more reliably. My dad adores them. No problems after a year of use, they're all still good and nothing's fallen apart or chipped. Very light weight. Quite happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: N. E.

customer_reviews.title: So sensitive, so smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Ever order an Amazon product that was so good it seemed impossible to criticize in a bad review? That's how I feel about this stylus. I thought rubber tips and uncertain and/or sticky touches was all there was. This stylus glides like a hockey puck on ice. The touch sensitivity is as precise as skin itself. There are no rubbery smudges to be seen on your glass. Thank you so much whoever invented this!
customer_reviews.author: C. O. Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Clip breaks off almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I bought a two-pack of these... I have a homegrown iPad app that is better if using a stylus. (Apple Pencil not necessary). I had a different brand but I decided to try these based on the review. I keep the stylus clipped into my iPad case. The clip broke on the second use. All of these are going back.
customer_reviews.author: LA Dan

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband to go with his new ipad. He dislikes using his finger, hates the smudges. So this solution seemed perfect. I read the reviews on this and other products and was sold on the replacable tips... Package arrived quickly and product was as described. Husband, while skeptical, tried them out and within a few swipes was sold! He now swears by them and will not use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Fedamene

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well these work...I Needed to replace a rubber tipped one and glad I picked these. They seem to be so much better than those rubber tipped ones. I haven't had one of those last more then 6 months with minimal use and I'm pretty gentle with them. The order came quickly in a nice little box to keep them all together, very well made and a real bonus was getting 4 for what I paid for the one I replaced and extra tips too!! Very happy with my choice and purchase..
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased with these Styluses. I was initially worried that the lack of the pointed tip may really affect performance. However, these work just fine and are a great alternative to using your fingers for better grip, precision and control, especially when painting or for calligraphy. I've been primarily using these with the Procreate app on my iPad mini and have really enjoyed them! They're not super pressure sensitive though, which is why I knocked off one star. I'm curious to see how they compare with the Apple Pencil, but this is definitely does the job at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Anu R.

customer_reviews.title: This is a FANTASTIC deal
customer_reviews.text: I have been through dozens of different styles of stylus (styli?), expensive ones to cheap ones over the years. I didn't expect too much of these since they were not at all expensive...but WOW! This one may just be my FAVORITE stylus yet! Precise, well made, doesn't smudge my screen and one heck-of-a-deal! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: 01_Guy_Stuff

customer_reviews.title: I'm writing this with the stylus
customer_reviews.text: My first stylus so can't compare to rubber tips but so far exactly what I hoped. I was worried the fat looking tip might not discriminate enough but it is like a small finger so behaves like an extension of my hand. Very soft on the surface which I like, so I don't worry it's scratching anything. I bought it for my mom but am keeping one as it responds better than my fingers (which are pretty dry) and I will have less finger smudging, too. Very happy with it. Great colors. Has the proper weight that you'd expect in a pen this size, too.
customer_reviews.author: Explorer

customer_reviews.title: value pack
customer_reviews.text: the metal bits could be softer and for a 4 ease-of- holding because that little clip could come apart edges. metal in your hand if accidentally loosened, but really... the first durable stylus head.... what value with these plus replacement heads. average material except the exquisite touch knob. its gotta be the best and tough, I've wasted so much capital on pens that rip after 3-5 days, break, crack, cut my hand etc. thank you for making this happen
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stylus
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these stylus for very long, so my review is based on limited use. However, I have found that most stylus with replaceable tips tend to get loose and fall off. I have not found this to be a problem with these. They were reasonably priced. Arrived quickly and in good condition. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Not much use on a Kindle 10 with a screen protector...
customer_reviews.text: We needed a stylus for working through a school app on the Kindles. Either these are total crap or because there is a screen protector on our Kindle these just don't work. It has to be pressed hard onto the screen and then the result is very inaccurate writing (which doesn't cut it for school assignments). I am really disappointed by these.
customer_reviews.author: JBtw

customer_reviews.title: Tip does not work well with iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: I have a iPhone X with protective material on screen. The tip is a little too soft and requires extra effort to get it to work. Also the diameter of the tip is a little large and makes texting with it difficult because of the size of the print. You get the wrong letter or number frequently.
customer_reviews.author: bfd

customer_reviews.title: Not very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Not very sensitive unless you press down especially when angled ... also squeeks.. and heavy meaning if youre writing an drop it on your ipad.. it may dame the screen .. returning. Nice colors though and looks fancier than most styluses Rubber tips are more sensitve. These tips are almost too slippery
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are made well. I was afraid with the mesh covering the rubber on the end it may not make a good contact but it works wonderfully. I stream on my tablet and the stylus keeps me from getting smudges and fingerprints all over the screen. The pocket clip on it is strong. Like I said, well made, quality material.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This stylus is comfortable in my hand. The weight and size of it are very nice. It balances nicely in my hand while working on my iPad. I put one in my purse to use with my iPhone. The screens respond very well with moderate touch. I think this is a good value. I would highly recommend purchasing this item. The little rounded tip doesn’t scratch my screens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylus
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot I can say about a stylus. It is what it is. They seem to be sturdy and a good quality. I would have given them five stars but the replacement tips are not nearly as nice as the last brand I bought. Those tips were attached to metal ring and just had to be screwed on while these have to be placed on and then make sure it remains straight until you can screw on the metal ring.
customer_reviews.author: Inga

customer_reviews.title: Nice length. Heavier than ones I’ve bought previously
customer_reviews.text: Nice length. Heavier than ones I’ve bought previously, but easy to get used to. Good balance. I like the tips much better than the rubber ones. Slide much more easily for scrolling. Also nice that they sent a set of extra tips. I’ve had these about six months, use them every day and haven’t needed to replace my original tips, but it’s good to know I can do that when the time comes. M
customer_reviews.author: L Cranston

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Had been looking to replace a 4.5" mesh-tip stylus that had worn out. These are 5", a little longer than what I was looking for, but pretty much the same form factor. They're as accurate as a finger, well constructed, reasonably priced, and they come with replacement tips.
customer_reviews.author: Kidjo

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Just received a week ago. First impression: The tip slides smoothly and the pen has a comfortable weight feel. Long term durability to be determined.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: ... up so she can uses it so it is great and I will buy it again if I need ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a handicap patient that is a quad and she has little movement in her right hand and I do mean a little bit and I was able to set it up so she can uses it so it is great and I will buy it again if I need to but with the extra tips I should not have to just buy the tips and it's good to go. I defiantly give it five stars
customer_reviews.author: Julia E Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful change!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stylus! Wish I would have tried them years ago. The stylus is a bit larger around which I like much better. Also, the mesh tip is fabulous. So smooth. With replacement tips, it will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mom is thrilled
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack of stylus for my mom who got her first smartphone (an iPhone) this year. The problem was that she couldn't easily press the letters she wanted when texting, as the concept of touchscreen was quite novel to her. Voila - these have helped immensely and she's becoming a texting machine! I really credit this small tool to helping her overcome the initial challenge of the new technology. The price was great and she has four of them to keep in various purses. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ren D.

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect stylus pens
customer_reviews.text: Stylus pens are almost perfect. They are easy to handle and they work perfectly on many screens including writing signatures for the most part. The only drawback is that the finish on the pens comes off very easily. That is the only disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Neal Ward

customer_reviews.title: Product Quality and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Received Stylist Pens, great quality...Customer Service for questions on product very responsive! I ordered the Tether Lanyard Peg Holder to attach stylist pen to IPad, Tablet or Kindle...This product keeps you organized....I know it will be top quality as well...Will definitely order again from CCIVV when the need arises....
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Stylus Delivered As Promised Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I must say I didn't know what to expect when ordering these Stylus. I am definitely impressed and would recommend to anyone. They are very strong and durable the tops are perfect. The grasp on the Stylus is very comfortable and I live the colors they came in. Excellent Buy,Shipped as Promised, Awesome Product.
customer_reviews.author: D Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the smoothest stylus I have ever used. Just glides across the screen. The only thing kept me from giving it a 5 star rating is that it requires a “harder tap” before it is recognized. While typing It is very easy for it to miss a letter. I have only had it for about 10 days or so so I may have to get used to that.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job for me.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a stylus that works fine but is lost in my hand. It's made for a woman and a smart phone. I bought these because they looked a bit larger and more masculine than my wife's small feminine colored stylus. They will be used on my Amazon Fire Tablet mainly, but they worked fine on my cell phone. The screen stays much cleaner using these than using a finger all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only stylus to ever own.
customer_reviews.text: The stylus works so much better than rubber tipped ones... it's hard to believe that anyone would have ever used a rubber tipped stylus. The Screen stays clean so long as you only use the mesh tip... and only gets smudged when I touch the screen with my fingers. Excellent product... and, though I haven't had to use the extra tips yet... it's really nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: mike o

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Really smooth operating. Hardly any smudges. Too sensitive. By that I mean the screen reacts so quickly and easily to the slightest touch that I going places I never intended, but I am getting use to the new feel, and now prefer it to rubber tips, and even my fingers
customer_reviews.author: Quantum monk

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Stylus is solidly constructed and I love the metal mesh tip. The ring that holds the tip is threaded which holds the tip firmly in the stylus. I like it much better than the rubber tipped stylus with friction fit ring that continually came off the stylus. Excellent product. The only recommendation I have is to clean the tip periodically with denatured alcohol. It can pickup up dirt from the screen after a period of use.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: These Hybrid Mesh Fiber Tip Stylus Pens perform beautifully and easily.
customer_reviews.text: These stylus pens, with the Hybrid Mesh Fiber Tips, are the best. I find these stylus pens to be the best that I have ever used, and believe me, I have purchased a lot of different stylus devices over the years. These work with ease, are precise and I have yet to wear one out. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Silverado Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Really good stylus
customer_reviews.text: I found these fiber tip stylus to be much better than the rubber tip stylus on the Kindle. They glide over the glass very smoothly with little or no pressure required. It comes with extra tips but I did not see any instructions on how to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: MandBinc

customer_reviews.title: Best styluses to buy
customer_reviews.text: These styluses are great, the material on the tip is kinda fabric like and makes it slide across your screen naturally. I hate using styluses that stick to the screen and are grabby, I'd rather just use my finger. But these ones are actually a better experience than using your fingers, which is how it's supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: JaredP

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these! Exactly as promised; glide over the screen easily, lightweight, feels good in my hand (yes, that is important). I haven’t had to change the tip yet so if I run into any isssue with that I’ll update my post but for now, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good stylus but not for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: They are well made and comfortable to hold. They just don’t work on my iPhone well. For it to make contact and work on the screen, I have to press down harder than I should have to. They work great on android phones though.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Thomte

customer_reviews.title: ... a lot of drawing on my iPhone with a great app that lets me make art wherever I am
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of drawing on my iPhone with a great app that lets me make art wherever I am. Most stylus pens that I have used wear out after only a few days. I tried all kinds and the one I loved best is no longer available or at least I can’t find one. It had a heavier rubber tip and lasted a looong time. I just got these a week ago but am so far still using the first one. And it writes smoothly too.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Bogan

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy in my hands and grip things too hard. I kept rubbing the tip off my stylus. I would go through one a week. These are amazing! The tips feel like cloth. The design fits well in my hand. Loved them so much I came back for a second set. I will share this fabulous find with others!
customer_reviews.author: Terri R

customer_reviews.title: The for styluses are different colors and they have a nice weighted feel to them
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this product. The package came with four styluses and four extra tips. The for styluses are different colors and they have a nice weighted feel to them. They are made out of metal. The tip is very sensitive and requires just the slightest pressure on the phone. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a quality stylus at a reasonable price. You will not find a better deal in any store. I bought one at a 99 cent store and it fell apart in 4 days. That same item was being sold at Walmart for $8.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford odom

customer_reviews.title: This stylus is useless!
customer_reviews.text: Use of this stylus requires excessive pressure to register on the iPhone 11 pro max. Whereas a light touch of a fat stubby finger works fine on the screen, use of this stylus require an annoying amount of pressure before anything happens. The stylus is beautiful, lightweight and great in every way, except it doesn't work very well at all!
customer_reviews.author: William Voss

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My dad uses these stylus pens for writing Chinese characters, and he claims they work great. Had to purchase a new set after a few years of daily use, so I'd say they perform well and are quite durable. He prefers these as they're easier to hold than the ultra thin pens.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moy

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary i-device stylus
customer_reviews.text: Received the ordered four-pack of styli right on time. I have been using two rubber-material tipped pens -- one on its last leg with the tip nearly completely ripped off and the other no longer functional. Both those had a difficult to move friction feel when dragging across the screen. The newly received pens are amazing in comparison. Instead of a rubbery tip, these new ones appear to have a kind of mesh tip (same size and shape) that glides effortlessly across the screen. Much improved ped. Recommend it to your consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have an old I-pad that I use this stylus for and it works well. The greatest use is on my cell phone. Texting is not easy on the cell phone when you have larger than average finders. I have these things everywhere. . .
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Fudge

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: The CCIVV stylus is well-balanced, which makes it easy for me to hold. I like the length of it: 5 inches. The tip is soft and has nothing in the construction that would scratch my phone screen.
customer_reviews.author: diamondstarproducer

customer_reviews.title: One of my best investments in stylus purchases
customer_reviews.text: One of my best investments in stylus purchases. I have used them over and over again. The store bought ones are a waste of money as they only seem to last a month and they are peeling and falling apart. This fabric end holds up very well and when I need replacements I will be coming back to this company again for the tips which are a screw on to the pen you want to use. A great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: I don't like using my devices with my finger
customer_reviews.text: I don't like using my devices with my finger. Not only does it leave smudges but I find it awkward. These work much better than the rubber tipped ones (that I find they drag horribly on the screen). These glide effortlessly on the screen. And the price is fantastic. I just hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel G-konig

customer_reviews.title: Great for touch screen use
customer_reviews.text: It works great! To AMAZON: I don’t want to have to sign in every time I’m asked for a product review—if request linked right up to me w/o signing in each time, I would respond much more! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid4

customer_reviews.title: These lag and are not sensitive enough!
customer_reviews.text: I feel as though when I use these pens on my ipad, I have to push down hard on the screen to get a response. It's very annoying and uncomfortable-- I wanted a stylus that would be seamless! Hoping to get a return or something, because it wasn't what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Asole

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These 4 Stylus pens came nicely packaged to avoid damage. The extra tips were also included. I like using them with my iPad mini. It didn't take me long to get used to how much pressure was needed to select and scroll. They are easy to use. I like the color assortment too. The silver really stands out. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alice G

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Stylus
customer_reviews.text: I use it primarily on my Samsung Galaxy tablet to play Microsoft Solitaire daily games. It works very well and I like knowing that I have replacement heads. Also having 4 pens with different colors I can use with other touchscreens. Good value and quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good reasonably priced product
customer_reviews.text: These styluses are terrific and reasonably priced. I put a little ring through the hole in the top so I can attach it to a lanyard and not lose it. It would be nice if the ring was included but ok that it wasn't. They're a bit of a tight fit for my Snugg iPad case - had to force it in...not a problem for me. Another plus - they come with 4 replacement tips.
customer_reviews.author: MST55

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like these mesh tips. They are just a tad wide, but so slippery on the touch screen that I love using them. I have them all over the house and in my work IPad as well. Definitely will buy again, because I often share with others when they admire them.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the stylus for about 2 weeks. It works much better than the older rubber tip stylus that I was using. It requires a very light touch on my IPAD screen compared to the older one. So far so good. No signs of wear or unraveling.
customer_reviews.author: TodaysWoman

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ with iphone 7. Also with bank ATM touchscreen!
customer_reviews.text: Can't do any better for the money with these. I can't speak for all devices, but I was having a hard time getting definitive info on iphone 7. I have one called an "otter" and these work great with it!
customer_reviews.author: happydogs

customer_reviews.title: Nicely sized
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for use with a new laptop. They work well, keep the screen in good shape and fit well into the case I bought for my laptop. Since I am known to lose stylus pens, the extras will, no doubt, come in handy,
customer_reviews.author: AZN8TV

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular stylus
customer_reviews.text: I love this stylus it’s made very well seems like good quality and feels good in your hand when using it 👍🏼 The price is awesome especially when you get a box of four 😊 These are excellent and I highly recommend them 💯
customer_reviews.author: jewell

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm highly impressed with the quality and feel of these stylus. They have a good weight and don't feel cheap. With the extra rubber tips, these will last a long time. I have paid twice as much for just one of this quality before in an office supply store. I'm planning on adding these to my shopping list, so I can find them again. I have a feeling it will be awhile before I need to replace these.
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: So-so.
customer_reviews.text: The fine wire mesh-like material used on the point is touchy and doesn't work as well as the rubber-like tips on other styluses.
customer_reviews.author: George Pelton

customer_reviews.title: Comes as you expect
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time and I go through them quickly. These, however, are great quality, last a long time, and will save your fingers from all sorts of aches and pains. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Not So Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This really doesn't do much better than your own finger. The tip needs to be smaller, so you hit the mark. Big Keys or Big Buttons apps work better. I don't use this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: S H Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: This style worked on my iphone 8 that has a screen protector--others didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This stylus worked on my iphone 8 that has a screen protector. It has a mesh tip, and a previous stylus I had with a rubber tip was useless. Maybe because I have a screen protector--I don't know, but was so glad to find this one that actually worked!
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: New and improved but smaller and less expensive.
customer_reviews.text: The design of the new fiber tip is different from their older model but I like this smaller, simpler, less expensive model even better. The fine tip is great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again (and again!)
customer_reviews.text: I play word games on an Android - these make a smoother swipe than my finger. I love that you get extra tips, because they do get soft in time and start skipping. Great stocking stuffer or just a gesture to someone you like :) Oh yeah.....these last longer than the rubber tipped ones.
customer_reviews.author: fairtheewell

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a rubber tipped sylus
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Had a rubber tipped it and it was so aggravating. These just slide across your screen without getting stuck someplace you don't want to go. And it's a huge plus that you can buy replacement tips, instead of a new stylus when all you need is the tip. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tatezi

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet stylus for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I had some more expensive ones that were dual tipped, but I never used the precision side and they came apart constantly. These are great compared to those. It would be nice if the tips were a bit smaller since they don't work well for typing on my cell phone (I use with a tablet mostly), but I really like them overall. And at this price I can stash them all over!
customer_reviews.author: Jinxgirl

customer_reviews.title: It works and does not need constant replacement tips.
customer_reviews.text: A functional and well made stylus with a tip that withstands a lot of usage. The stylii also come with replacement tips. Have not had to insert a new tip, but am sure it will be easy. I have added a wrist hand strap lanyard to make it easier to spot and keep handy. Gifted two to a friend who loves hers as well.
customer_reviews.author: CarolRabbit

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: My fingers are too big to use on my phone screen so I have to use a stylus. I initially used several styluses with a rubber tip but they didn't last long and left marks on my screen. One of my granddaughters found a mesh one for me but when I tried to find another one, the store no longer carried them. One of these mesh stylus lasts me for months and months and there are refills included. I just have to remember to hide them from my cat. She thinks they are her toys.
customer_reviews.author: SallyB

customer_reviews.title: A great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice stylus pens at a great price. Nice colors and long lasting. The fact that they each come with a refillable fiber tip is a bonus. I get lots of wear out of these. Great for Kindles, ipads, iphones, etc. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ML49

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously cool! Four styluses and extra mesh tops! What a deal! They work great on my phone screen and my iPad. I’ll buy again when I go through all of these but that might take a while because I’m still on the first one and I bought the pack months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ryanne

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don't know what I did before this stylus. It makes gliding over the screen so much easier. Not to mention, games easier to play. Less germs on the screen and your hands.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaRut36

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: these work great for me. my wife and granddaughter like them too. they are used on kindle fires and they do a good job. cant see any scratches from them ,either. I will buy these again when they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Diehard

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my rubber tipped stylus, that had developed a tear, to use on my iPad Pro. I can say they work great. Require only a light touch onto the screen, leaves no smudges on my glass protective screen ( bye bye frequent Windexing), and the stylusglides across the screen very smoothly so that I’m able to write on the screen nearly as legible as I do with pen on paper. Great product for only $9.99. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff SC

customer_reviews.title: Not good with a smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use with my smartphone and found that the tip is too big to use with my smart phone!
customer_reviews.author: B. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: very smooth!
customer_reviews.text: These flow over the screen very smoothly. They don't stick and comes with extra tips for the stylus pens. I like these so much I ordered a second set. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Best styluses
customer_reviews.text: The best stylus ever, they never fail, tips don't RIP, stick or drag over screen. Other colleagues have also purchased after using mine
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kuschnick

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  Convenient and indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how may stylus tips I went though before finding these! These are so sturdy and reliable...can't imagine wearing 'em out! However, it they ever do wear out, I have the extra tips they sent with the initial purchase! I highly recommend these to everyone! Stop searching and put this in your cart. I'm happy that I did.
customer_reviews.author: PeasandHarmony

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and she said they work great. She is still on the first one out of the pack and it is still working fine. The tip has not worn out as of yet and she has been using it for at least two months.
customer_reviews.author: van

customer_reviews.title: Best ones yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use a stylus almost everyday. I have had the cheap one all the way to pricey ones. These have been the best yet. Super durable, very easy to hole, glides extremely smooth over the screen. Not only is this a great price for one but you get 4 plus replacement tips. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Lewanski

customer_reviews.title: This was a great price for 4 and the big plus is that ...
customer_reviews.text: I use a stylus all the time. This was a great price for 4 and the big plus is that it has extra tips. I went to a big store and they had one stylus for the same price and no extra tip. So yes great value and them some. Thank you for your product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no issues we have used them on a iphone, samsung note 5 and the samsung galaxy s8 edge with no issues. We have been using the same one for over a month now without having to replace the tips. Made very durable. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MaryR

customer_reviews.title: These are the best kind if have found and that is after having ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best kind if have found and that is after having tried all kind of other types. Will always order again, no more typing errors using fat fingers. Thank you, Like the fact they come with replacement tips, that is an extra too. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: renatree

customer_reviews.title: They are great!
customer_reviews.text: Use for texting on my phone. My fingers don't work that great sometimes & these have saved me so much time & frustration!
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a credit card reader pen that we lost at work so it gets used constantly. Great durability, not good for detailed writing but a overall great casual stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Starley T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little styli.  A little slippery, still easy to hold.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good price for four plus four replacement tips. Work fine on smart phones and touch screens. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BillH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pens
customer_reviews.text: I use my iPad everyday and like to keep the screen clean. These stylus pens do the trick. I like having a pack of 4 so that when one wears out, I have another ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: CCIVV Stylus Pens
customer_reviews.text: Ok stylus pens...nothing major wrong with them, I think it’s more my personal preference. They are a little heavier than I like, wasn’t crazy about the mesh tips-I prefer rubber, tips aren’t as sensitive as other’s I’ve used and prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy S.

customer_reviews.title: Good stylus.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace some old 'universal stylus'. These work well on my iphone, note pad, and reader. And there are no cold spots on my electronic device for these them. I will stay with these, if they 'ever' break.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Fitchard

product_meta.title: CCIVV Stylus, 4 Pcs 5.0 Inches Hybrid Mesh Fiber Tip Stylus Pens for Touch Screen, Compatible with iPad, iPhone, Kindle Fire + 4 Extra Replaceable Hybrid Fiber Tips (White, Black, Silver, Blue)
product_meta.description:
Color:5.0 inches-4pcsContents - In the CCIVV retail packaging
4 x 5.0" Executive stylus
4 x Replacable mesh tips

Compatiblity:
Compatible with all touch screen devices with Mac OS system or Andriod system

Specifications:
Material of pen: Stainless steel, Copper
Material of tip: rubber, fiber
Colors: White, Black, Silver, Blue
Why CCIVV fiber tip stylus:
Stainless steel and aluminum without any plastic parts highly improve electrical conductivity.
The pen responds with very little pressure and glided over the screen very smoothly.
Well made & heavy duty with a nice quality look leads to a good choice for office, school, hotel, resturant, hospital, bank, etc.

With CCIVV:
We take full ownership and responsibility for the quality of our products. But if you for any reason are not happy with any product by CCIVV, please do not hesitate to contact us, we will do our best to solve your problems efficiently.

CAUTION:
Not suitable for children under 3-year old, contains small parts, be care of danger of swallowing by children.

Warm prompt:
What you have seen in the picture is absolutely what it is being, you might feel somewhat of color difference subject to the monitor and the camera, please in kind prevail.
feature_bullets: 100% Compatible with all capacities touch screen devices, as for Apple iPad, iPhone, iPod, Kindle Fire, Samsung Galaxy Tab, Nexus, Dragon Touch, Blackberry Playbook and etc
Sensitive Tip: Ultra-sensitive, smooth use on any screens of digital products, responsive as finger touch; protect your screens against fingerprints, grease, scratches, and other damage
Stylus - Length: 5.0"(126mm), Pen tube diameter 0.33"(8.5mm), fiber mesh tip diameter: 0.3" (8mm); made from stainless steel and aluminum, no plastic parts, real pen feeling
Well made & heavy duty with a nice quality look. Mesh tip is comfortable and silent when you glide smoothly and quickly across the screen, a big improvement from other pens with rubber tips
REPLACEABLE TIP FEATURE: Replacing can be done within a second without any tool, extending lifetime of the stylus. Great value for the price, perfect gift or give away to family members
